alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 8:51PM CST until March 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Due to recent heavy rainfall, the Little Wabash River at Carmi is in minor flooding. It is beginning to fall after a secondary crest and is now forecast to fall below flood stage Sunday evening. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The inundation of county roads begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 27.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CST Friday was 28.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening and continue falling to 20.8 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
